mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.body, b.inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id WHERE b.id = #{id} GROUP BY b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (title, body, inserted) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{inserted})
